response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds significant value to both parties. Given its worth to you, we propose a purchase price of $1,350,000. This offer reflects a strategic midpoint between our valuation and yours, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. We believe this price not only respects the value you see in the product but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1350000}
